verses.roman:
"tumi baḍa loka, paṇḍita, mahā-bhāgavate
sevā nā kariha, sukhe cala mora sāthe"

synonyms: tumi—you; baḍa loka—a great personality; paṇḍita—a learned scholar; mahā-bhāgavate—a great devotee; sevā nā kariha—please do not serve; sukhe—happily; cala—go; mora sāthe—with me.
translation: "You are a respectable gentleman, a learned scholar and a great devotee," he said. "Please do not try to serve me. Just come with me in a happy mood."
